message.label: LOGON ISSUE - 2/10/2020
message.copy: ** Access to VA/DoD eBenefits through DS Logon is currently intermittent. We apologize for any inconvenience. **

message.label: DMDC - Firewall maintenance - 2/8/2020
message.copy: ** Access to VA/DoD eBenefits through DS Logon will be unavailable from 1300 ET on Saturday, 8 February until 0100 ET on Sunday, 9 February. We apologize for any inconvenience. **

message.label: DO NOT DELETE - Refer user to Outage Calendar
message.copy: For feature and outage events, refer to the Outage Calendar link at the bottom of the page.

message.label: DO NOT DELETE - logout message to users
message.copy: To ensure your security and privacy, when using a shared or public computer, make sure you always log out of VA/DoD eBenefits and then close all browser windows when finished accessing the site.
